name: Pacman '96
overview: Yet another Pac-Man clone. This one is quite good actually. I kinda like that you can change the music during playing. Also the funny animations that plays every fourth level are cool. Game design by Andreas Oberdorfer; level design by Michael Gehmair. 68K Coding by Andreas Oberdorfer; RTG support (68K/OS4) & AmigaOS4 port by Jürgen Schober. Graphics by Andreas Oberdorfer; high score image by Christopher Dissauer; fruits, animation & scanning by Thomas Kutschera. Music by Andreas Oberdorfer; popman.mod based on an original composition (popcorn.mod) by Hawk/Atomic in 1988. Game includes a built-in level editor allowing players to create their own levels (or modify existing levels), and features full multitasking (memory permitting), joystick/joypad/keyboard support and WB window gameplay (256 colours only).
